item.title: CVE-2023-4518|2024-08-02T07:31:06.036Z -- hitachi%20energy -- relion670
item.description: A vulnerability exists in the input validation of the GOOSE messages where out of range values received and processed by the IED caused a reboot of the device. In order for an attacker to exploit the vulnerability, goose receiving blocks need to be configured.Â
